SEARCH

Package app.entity

package app.entity
Contains classes representing human and bot entities within the game, including their attributes. This package defines the player's behaviors, handles input and interactions for players, and help bots make decisions based on a strategy.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    app
    Root package for the Parade game.
    app.game
    Contains classes for managing the gameplay.
    app.network
    This package contains the classes that help to connect and run the game online.
    app.resource
    This package contains the resources classes such as cards and decks and the parade.
    app.utilities
    This package contains utility classes that help print the game elements.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BotPlayer
    This class contains the implementation of a Bot Player.
    HumanPlayer
    Represents a human player in the game of Parade.
    Player
    This class contains the skeleton that will be common between HumanPlayer and BotPlayer It holds 1 abstract method, which is takeTurn()
